content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills positioned at (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests for coal collection at (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) for coal movement
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5) moving materials
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Three burner mining drills at:
- (-10.0,-59.0)
- (-8.0,-59.0)
- (-6.0,-59.0)
Connected by transport belts and inserters to wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Four furnace setup with:
- Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input inserters and chests above furnaces
- Output inserters and chests below furnaces
- Connected by transport belts for material movement

### Power Generation at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Steam power setup with:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Connected by pipe network
- Small electric pole network connecting to lab

### Research Lab
Single lab connected to power network, currently not researching

ERROR TIPS

### Crafting errors
- Ensure required ingredients are available in inventory before attempting to craft items
- Check recipe requirements before initiating crafting operations

### Resource extraction errors
- Must be within interaction range of target chest/entity when attempting to extract items
- Verify chest contains requested items before attempting extraction

### Entity operation errors
- Burner entities (drills, inserters) require fuel to operate
- Many entities showing "out of fuel" warnings - ensure coal supply is maintained
- Some inserters waiting for source items - check input supply chains

### Fluid system warnings
- Steam engine showing "no input liquid" - ensure proper pipe connections and water supply
- Verify fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
